article.title: Castello
article.paragraph: Castellois the Italian word forcastle. The Latin wordCastellummeans reservoir, water tank.
article.heading: Places

list.listitem: Castello, Veniceis the largest of the sixsestieriof Venice
Castello, the old town center ofGiudicato of Cagliariin Sardinia
Castello, Hong Kong, a private housing estate in Hong Kong
A locality in the town ofMonteggioin Switzerland

article.heading: Other

list.listitem: Roman Catholic Diocese of Castello, a former diocese based in Venice

article.heading: See also

list.listitem: Citt di Castello, a town in Umbria, Italy
